nurses_2.widgets.texture_tools#

Tools for graphic widgets.

Functions

composite(source, dest[, pos, mask_mode])

Composite source texture onto destination texture at given position.

read_texture(path)

Return a uint8 RGBA numpy array from a path to an image.

resize_texture(texture, size[, interpolation])

Resize texture.
nurses_2.widgets.texture_tools.Interpolation#

Interpolation methods for resizing graphic widgets.

alias of Literal[‘nearest’, ‘linear’, ‘cubic’, ‘area’, ‘lanczos’]

nurses_2.widgets.texture_tools.composite(source: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.uint8]], dest: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.uint8]], pos: nurses_2.geometry.Point = Point(y=0, x=0), mask_mode: bool = False)#

Composite source texture onto destination texture at given position.

If mask_mode is true, source alpha values less than 255 are ignored.

nurses_2.widgets.texture_tools.read_texture(path: pathlib.Path) → numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.uint8]]#

Return a uint8 RGBA numpy array from a path to an image.

nurses_2.widgets.texture_tools.resize_texture(texture: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.uint8]], size: nurses_2.geometry.Size, interpolation: Literal['nearest', 'linear', 'cubic', 'area', 'lanczos'] = 'linear') → numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.uint8]]#

Resize texture.
